about_the_game:
THE WAR IS LOST
The Emperor is dead, the Imperial army in shambles, and southern rebels are storming the border. Amid the chaos, abandoned Imperial soldiers must regroup and retreat, cut off from any support or leadership. Forced to battle not only the encroaching enemy but also starvation, illness, and declining morale, the lost Imperial soldiers face an impossible task.

BRAVE THE JOURNEY HOME
Take charge of The Sparrows, a decimated group of soldiers, as they make the perilous journey home to safety. Get to know a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motivations and traumas. Decide how their story unfolds as they brave the hostile territories they once helped conquer.

THEIR FATE IN YOUR HANDS
The lives of The Sparrows are in your hands. Death is real in Singing the Pass, and the choices you make will have consequences. Take on deadly missions in turn-based tactics gameplay and make life-altering decisions in beautifully rendered narrative events. To make it home alive, sacrifices will have to be made. Only together do The Sparrows stand a chance.

content_descriptors.notes: Game aims to portray the tragedy of war in a realistic way and covers a wide range of mature content.
